channel.title: marcel on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in marcel on Barefoot Rob

item.title: Dream virtual room with Travis
item.description: ##06:39 Monday 23 March 2015 JST## Travis and I were in a virtual reality on my computer. He showed me a room that was similar to what I had seen before, so I almost didn't go inside to explore. Then I was like, "wait if Travis showed me this, it must be cool" so I went inside to check the place out. It was *amazing* with 3D virtual games inside the groom, a hologram which could be manipulated by touching the screen and project into the room; and some hidden rooms behind the walls with hinged doors on mirrors that caused the hologram to reflect "
